> [loligod](#comment_3_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): Having an open and censorship resistant internet means that there will be access to controversial topics. I can understand where you are coming from if any of my sites included child pornography. But none of them do. Getting hot and bothered by harmless 2D animation is immature. 
> I mark all my work. sirenyc properly put a 18+ mark. Nobody is forcing you to visit any of my sites. You do it of your own volition. If you feel uncomfortable seeing a link then maybe you should stick to your censored internet. 
> 
> I find it interesting how you intend to make a list of Zeronet Sites but willingly censor links when anybody get their panties in a twist. Why would anybody take a second look at this list when they know it's actively censored and they won't be able to get the complete picture? I know things are controversial, but, if you're going by US legality here, my sites are completely legal while all the pirating and torrenting sites are not. I respectfully ask you to reconsider the removal of links. It makes no sense devaluing your list, censoring things, on an anti-censorship network. If people don't want to see something they don't need to click the link. Regardless it's not going anywhere.

I was originally complaining more about the fact that some pedo board was included on the list while the general-use imageboard was not.  That said, I am not a fan of pedophiles and I do not want to see their stuff on lists like this.  There is a big difference between the censorship on the surface web and sirenyc taking pedo stuff off of this list.  Anyone can make their own list here.  If you want to make your own interesting site list and include pedo stuff along with mainstream content then that is fine and it is within no one's right or power to stop you.  If I start seeing too many pedo links here or other places I may start taking steps to stop hosting those links, but for the moment I feel that helping share them does at least keep you people from spamming the rest of us into oblivion with child pornography.

> [loligod](#comment_3_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): Getting hot and bothered by harmless 2D animation is immature.
Oh and if you're going to argue this you might as well take it all the way home and say that it's immature to complain about digital photos of child abuse since no one is being physically harmed by the photo continuing to exist.  While I agree with you in principle, the reality is that this stuff is banned basically everywhere civilized and no one has any use for it except for the creeps who get of on it and the creeps who get off on catching them.  I don't know what the solution is for you people, but I know that you are a huge liability to projects like zeronet.  I am all for the freedom to possess any kind of information you can get your hands on.  I just don't want to get v& for someone else's sick fetish.

> [loligod](#comment_4_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): it's not logical to associate [loli hentai] with the harm child porn brings
It is logical because while loli stuff isn't technically illegal in as many places the consequences for being associated with it are basically the same.  That is the same kind of harm to me.  I understand the difference between loli hentai and cp.

> [loligod](#comment_4_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): Being anti-censorship only means something when no party is blocked.
No party is blocked when sirenyc choses not to list your site any more.  You are now arguing for the right to force someone to make speech that they don't want to.  You have your own ability to speak for your website.  We are all on a level playing field here.  That is very different than on YouTube or Google where there is a central authority deciding who gets to say what.

> [loligod](#comment_4_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): Are you saying that you host the pedo links you are so opposed to? It just doesn't make any sense.
I mean I host the actual links.  Like before sirenyc removed your site from the list, I seeded that list of links, including one to your site, to other people.

> [loligod](#comment_4_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): trying to address your flawed, hateful, and incoherent logic. Once again our disagreement is how we perceive child porngraphy differently.
There is nothing hateful here.  I feel bad for you guys.  Whether its biological or environmental or both you are attracted to children.  Some of you abuse your own kids or those of others, while some just draw pictures of it and wax poetic on the internet about how we're all bigots who are oppressing children and the kind adults who want to fuck them.  Again, I don't even think posession of cp itself should be a crime, but producing it sure as fuck is and if you are attracted to children you need some serious help.

> [loligod](#comment_4_1EpY11syeaKbwRSNqv9tU1ZxoU1moJA9Bp): Never once did I even suggest spamming. You are attacking a straw man.
I was referring to how without containment areas you guys will spill over into what is supposed to be a clean place and shit all over our five seconds of freedom because of your paraphillia.
